page.title: 03RELIGION IN AYLESBURY
page.content: The religious life of Aylesbury is represented by many Christian denominations and a {Moslem mosque}.Other religions such as {Hinduism,Judaism and Sikhism} have members but no formal place of worship. The Roman Catholic church accounts for about one third of Christians in Aylesbury from several nationalities.The Anglican church of {St. Mary's} has a congregation of about 150 and an active {community centre}.The Methodist church has about 200 members.All the churches are involved in a wide range of week night activities and fund raising projects - community work is strong.The community centre of St. Mary's involves people from all sections of the community,both Christians and non-Christians.
